Text: Regarding Bruce C StudleyDear Mr Skilling Thank you for requesting electronically the previously mailed information concerning my background I truly appreciate your help and assistance as it pertains to how my experience and involvement in the successful operation of Independent Power Plants may be of interest and value to Enron I can be reached for any further discussions or information by calling my cellular phone at or home at When your schedule permits I would be very interested in meeting with you to discuss in person my background and possible ways of contributing to Enrons on going operations Your assistance is greatly appreciated Bruce C Studley studresdoc studskildoc
